bio:
I am currently a fourth-year Ph.D. candidate in the NLP Group at The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, under the supervision of Professor Maggie Wenjie Li. My research focuses on Situated Conversational Recommendation, LLM-based Reasoning, and Multimodal LLMs. Additionally, I am deeply interested in areas such as Speech Generation and Visual Understanding. Since August 2025, I have been serving as a Research Intern at Huawei Hong Kong Research Center (HKRC), Fermat Lab (Huawei 2012 Labs), where I received the Excellent Intern Award. I am passionate about applying NLP technologies to real-world scenarios, aiming to help people experience the various ways in which AI can enrich their lives.

Prior to my doctoral studies, I earned a Bachelor's degree from Sun Yat-sen University, graduating with a GPA of 3.8/4.0, ranking 37th out of 433 students. I was directly admitted to the Master's program through the postgraduate recommendation and successfully completed my Master's degree, achieving a GPA of 3.9/4.0. During my master's studies, I was advised by Prof. Rong Pan. After that, I completed a research internship at SIAT, Chinese Academy of Sciences, under the supervision of Prof. Min Yang.
bio_zh:
我目前是香港理工大学 NLP Group 的四年级博士生，导师为 Maggie Wenjie Li 教授。我的研究聚焦于情境会话推荐、基于 LLM 的推理和多模态 LLM。此外，我也对语音生成和视觉理解等方向非常感兴趣。自 2025 年 8 月起，我在华为香港研究中心（HKRC） Fermat Lab（华为 2012 实验室）担任研究实习生，期间获评优秀实习生。我热衷于将 NLP 技术应用到真实世界场景中，希望帮助人们体验 AI 丰富生活的多种方式。

在攻读博士之前，我本科毕业于中山大学，GPA 为 3.8/4.0，在 433 名学生中排名 37。随后我通过推免直接进入硕士阶段并顺利完成学业，硕士 GPA 为 3.9/4.0。硕士期间，我的导师是潘嵘教授。之后我前往中国科学院深圳先进技术研究院（SIAT）实习，接受 杨敏老师 指导。
